criteria: All foundational modules (Entities, State Machine, Outbox) have >80% unit test coverage. CI/CD pipeline can successfully deploy the skeleton service to the staging EKS cluster. Database integration tests using Testcontainers are passing.
success_metrics: Zero regressions; successful deployment to staging; all foundational tests passing.

criteria: End-to-end tests for order creation and cancellation are passing. All SQS event handlers are proven to be idempotent. Code coverage remains above 80%. Security scan (e.g., Snyk) reports no new high-severity vulnerabilities.
bypass_criteria: Approval from Product Owner for any minor deviations.
success_metrics: All acceptance criteria for OMS-002, OMS-003, OMS-004, and OMS-005 are met and demonstrated.
